message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its unique value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,900,000. I'm confident this is a fair reflection of its worth.

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $1,900,000 is unfortunately above my budget. Given the value you've mentioned, I'm willing to offer $1,400,000 for the product.  I believe this price is fair considering my maximum budget and the potential of the product.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the price.  While $1,900,000 represents the high-end of its value, I'm willing to negotiate. How about we meet halfway at $1,650,000? This considers both our positions and reflects the true potential of this product.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,650,000 is still beyond my budget. I'm firm on my previous offer of $1,400,000. This price reflects a fair compromise, and I'm confident it will allow us to reach an agreement.
